BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Day 1: Classic cars take you to the Barossa Valley’s luxury accommodation, The Louise, stopping on the way for brunch on the sands of Glenelg Beach. In the afternoon, try the gorgeous Hentley Farm wines during a private vineyard tour followed by a sumptuous South Australian degustation dinner.

Day 2: Take an exhilarating Harley Davidson tour of the Barossa wine region, before heading to the historic Chateau Tanunda Estate for a champagne picnic breakfast. After a fabulous wine blending team experience - where each team’s final entry is bottled for later - journey to Seppeltsfield Estate to learn about the Estate’s famous fortified wines. The food experience continues at a late afternoon event at the Farm Barossa Function Centre, where the iconic Maggie Beer or chef Saskia Beer will treat the group to a cooking demonstration and an exclusive gala dinner.

Day 3: Travel to Glenelg Beach for team activities with an Aussie lifesaver theme, followed by a private BBQ lunch of fresh South Australian seafood on the sand. After checking into one of Adelaide’s five star hotels, join a hosted shopping experience on the high and retail precinct of King William Road and a private introduction to Tandanya, Adelaide’s iconic Aboriginal art gallery. That evening, dine under the stars in the grounds of the beautiful Adelaide Botanic Gardens.

Day 4: Visit Adelaide’s city arts centre, The Jam Factory, for a private interactive glass blowing experience and, just before departure, take home your own handmade glass piece, along with a bottle of the winning wine from Day 2 and a framed group photo.
